Name: Munker Hearts
Description: 青から紫へのハートと緑からオレンジへのハート
Author: Kitaoka

Name: Confetti illusion
Description: The Munker illusion, which produces two apparently different hues from a base color, can be extended to multiple apparent colors. By having foreground stripes in more than two colors, it is possible to create multiple foreground colors that lead to multiple apparent hues in the base objects. This technique works well for three colors and can be extended to four, six, and even ten colors.
Author: David Novick, Akiyoshi Kitaoka

Name: Rotating snakes: a gray scale version
Description: Each disk appears to rotate 'spontaneously' in the constant direction, from black to dark gray, white, light gray, back to black.
Author: Kitaoka

Name: Heat devil #6
Description: The image appears to wave or to be like a heat devil
Author: Kitaoka

Name: A through
Description: The left half appears to move leftward while the right half rightward.
Author: Kitaoka

Name: Dorayaki
Description: Rows of dorayaki (kinds of cakes) move.
Author: Kitaoka

Name: Trampoline
Description: The inset appears to move. This figure consists of squares.
Author: Kitaoka

Name: Makudonarudo
Description:
*Japanese pronunciation of McDonald's

Each row appears to move in the horizontal direction.
Author: Kitaoka

Name: Watashi
Description:
*Ferry boat

The inset appears to move in the horizontal direction.
Author: Kitaoka

Name: Motion of snakes 2021
Description: Each row appears to move laterally.
Author: Akiyoshi Kitaoka

Name: Rotating Snakes
Description: 蛇の円盤が勝手に回転して見える
Author: Kitaoka

Name: Blue train 2021
Description: The upper half appears to move leftward while the lower one rightward.
Author: Kitaoka
